masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "Someone's hitting the vault during our Christmas Eve gala! They cut the power during the fireworks displayâ€”perfect cover. Security is blind. We've got $50 million in the vault and a thousand guests who don't know anything's wrong yet. Quietly. PLEASE."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop the heist without alerting the gala guests
  • Navigate the dark casino to find the thieves
  • Secure the vault before they escape with millions
